Serpenti Forever chain wallet in emerald green calf leather with black nappa leather interior. Captivating snakehead magnetic closure in light gold-plated brass, embellished with black and white agate enamel scales and green malachite eyes.

Smooth nappa calf leather / Dimensions: / 24(H)x32(L)x14(D) cm / 9.50”(H)x12.50”(L)x5.50”(D) inches / Weight: 1 kg / Handle drop 12cm – 4.75” inches / Clasp closure / Inside zipper pocket / Brushed hardware / Branded lining / Removable shoulder strap drop 60 cm – 23.50” inches / Protective metal feet / Internal metal plate “Arcadia Made in Italy”

DESIGN NOTES Featured in Acadia Melbourne, take a walk through a hand-drawn blooming forest, where you can spot jaguars and tigers through lush greenery. Made with genuine croc-embossed leather.  For tips and information on how to protect and maintain the quality of your handbag, please visit our Product Care Page.  Satchel 2-way zip top closure Rolled handles Back slide in pocket Adjustable crossbody strap Double kangaroo pockets & pen loops Interior zip pocket Key clip Handle 4" Strap 25"
